SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Such quietude... And what is this
tension I feel in the air?

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
The people are frozen solid? How beautiful.
It appears darkness has already visited
this town, and we see now its aftermath.

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Has his curse already befallen this place?
No! I refuse to accept it!

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Ah, so this is your world, General. Even so,
I am going to stop you before you attempt to
explain the situation. Do not rob from me
the joy of exploring this beautiful place.

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, Grelon is beautiful, and no mistake.
But whether its beauty is authentic is
something you will have to figure out
for yourself, Count.

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Darkness powerful enough to freeze a world?
Yes, I do believe I will enjoy this Grelon—
and I expect I'll meet some truly enticing
individuals who prove worthy of my love.

SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_00.text:
People and buildings have been frozen solid.
How beautiful! I expect I will meet some
very enticing beings in this place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh wow, mister! You're not frozen!
Boy, am I ever glad to see you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
Explain why you remain unfrozen, boy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I'd like to know the answer to that myself!
This morning I went into the mine, and when
I came out, it was like this! This has all
to be because of the curse...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So, there was this emperor a long time ago.
He died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze them right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I guess 'eventually' turned out
to be today.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
So you claim to have escaped the curse through
sheer luck? One might well wonder if it was you
who triggered this curse in the first place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything,
Mr. Siugnas, I swear! As for why I'm not frozen, the only thing
I can think of is that it has something to do
with these matches I brought into the mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Their light is supposed to ward off evil,
so maybe they kept me from freezing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
Then why do you not use those
matches to thaw the frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, that's a good idea! Will you come
with me while I try to unfreeze people?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Will they even be alive
once the ice has thawed?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Um, you're kind of scaring me, mister.
Let's just hurry and try to save them.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_00.text: That child is behind all of this. It is so blindingly obvious, I didn't even feel the need to point it out at the time. I mean, no one is that stupid!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_01.text:
You believe he laid the curse
which now has you so upset?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_02.text: That boy? No, of course not—he's merely a stooge who put the plan in motion. The true mastermind is hiding somewhere.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_000_CUT_010_03.text:
I find it hard to believe a young child
could create a thing of such beauty—
but I DO believe the darkness in you
is linked to whoever cast this curse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.text:
So not everything in this world is frozen?
Mmm. I had hoped to enjoy this world in 
beautiful silence, but it appears there
are factors I failed to account for.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.text:
How can you be so cruel?
Everyone here is frozen!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.text:
All I know is the sweet spectacle of this
frozen world. If at one point it were not so,
there must be a reason. A natural occurrence,
perhaps? Or some villain's intentional act?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.text: I don't know HOW it happened!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.text:
We have a curse powerful enough to freeze an
entire world, and a boy curiously unaffected.
What have you done, child?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text:
The first unfrozen being I meet in this
world knows the very reason why this is? This is obviously some sort of scheme with
myself as its target—but I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King, and I gladly accept
the challenge that awaits! Now let us use your matches to thaw
these people and see what transpires.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.text:
I don't really get what you're saying,
but it sounds like you're going to help!
Oh, and I'm Alexandre, by the way.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_00.text:
You see the trap, yet blunder willingly
into it? In a situation such as this,
I suppose there is no other choice.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_01.text:
If that boy is the source of this curse,
why invite my aid? I must know the reason. If his intention is to use me,
I will teach him that the labor
of the Dismal King is not cheap.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_100_CUT_010_02.text:
It is a rare gift to behold your anger,
Count. You clearly have a great many
secrets you are keeping from me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.text:
All I know is the sweet spectacle of this
frozen world. If it was not always so,
then the answer is clear. You understand
my meaning here, I take it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.text:
But I didn't do anything, I swear!
This has to be because of the curse! Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So there's an emperor from a long time ago who
died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze 'em right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.text:
I'm guessing this is all happening because
of the curse—and that the reason I'm not
frozen is because of these matches.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.text:
And how did you come by these
magical matches of yours?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.text:
I... Oh, weird! I don't know who gave them to me!
I found them in my pocket this morning, which is
why I decided to go into the mine, but everything
before that is a blank.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
Someone clearly gave the boy these matches
in an attempt to lure him into darkness.
Is another fell presence at work here besides
what froze the world? Could it be... Mmm.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.text:
Boy, I expect you could use those matches to
thaw the frozen villagers. That is the role
someone has assigned you to play in this.
Embrace it or refuse it: the choice is yours.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.text: I'll do it! I'll save everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.text:
Then you will have the protection of the
Dismal King as you go about your task.
And yet, I wonder if your countrymen are
still alive beneath that hoary frost.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_00.text:
A freezing curse and matches to melt it?
An elaborate scheme for certain,
but to what end?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_01.text:
We find ourselves in your world, General.
Have no possibilities occurred to you?
Or do you know more than you wish to say?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_02.text:
Need I remind you, Count, that you're
the one who bade me tell you nothing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_REMNANT_200_CUT_010_03.text:
Ah. Indeed I did. In that case,
I shall return to searching out
the enticing beings of this world.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.text:
I've only got eight matches left, which is
probably not enough to save everyone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.text:
We've already used half the matches.
There's only four left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_410_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_410_00.text:
That man is all anyone talks about!
It's driving me crazy!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_410_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_410_01.text:
You refer to the so-called
'final emperor,' I take it?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.text: We've only got one match left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.text:
Then who shall receive it?
The choice is yours.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last match.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.text:
No! I have to find a way
to save EVERYONE!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.text:
The fate of this world concerns me not.
However, I do possess an interest in
whoever it was that chilled it so.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Boy, tell me all you know of this
final emperor who appears in dreams.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_05.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.text:
There is no doubt the final emperor is
involved in some one way or another.
Shall we pay his palace a visit?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'd really appreciate it,
Mr. Siugnas, sir!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_09.text:
I act not for your sake. If the final emperor
cast the last rays of light over this land,
then it was he who plunged it into darkness.
This piques my interest in him.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_00.text:
That child is certainly determined to
keep you around. He must understand
how powerful you truly are.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_01.text:
I care not a whit for the boy. All that interests
me is the final emperor and his connection to you,
General—so perhaps it is time you chose to share
that story with your Dismal King.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_02.text:
All of his glories were won by me.
He much resented this fact,
and wished me dead because of it.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_03.text:
So you died by the final emperor's hand
before being reborn in Brighthome?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_04.text:
I'm not such a fool as to die at his hand!
I saw it coming, and so fled his service.
But with me gone, his empire crumbled almost
immediately. Ah, but it was madness...

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The foolish emperor in your story makes a
disconcerting contrast with the man capable
of cursing this world so thoroughly. Perhaps there was more to him
than you realized. Or perhaps...

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_000_CUT_010_07.text: Or perhaps you yet hide something.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.text:
The final emperor appeared in everyone's dreams,
meaning he is clearly the origin of the curse.
And now that we know the cause, you are free
to do whatsoever you please.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.text:
I am not wholly satisfied with that.
If I were to leave now, all of my
hard work will have been for naught.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Come, boy. I will lend you my aid in
solving the mystery of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.text:
Thank you, Mr. Siugnas! The palace
where the final emperor was confined
is right at the top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.text:
If the final emperor froze these people in an
attempt to plunge this world into darkness,
who was it that bequeathed you the matches?
There is another force at work in this world.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_06.text:
As the Dismal King, I would see where this
world's darkness leads. But in order to
do that, I must first solve the mystery
of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_07.text:
That's great, Mr. Siugnas! In that case, 
I think we should visit the final emperor's
palace. It's right at the top of that hill.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last of the matches.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_04.text: But there's nothing else I can do!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Boy, who was this 'final emperor'
that appeared in the dreams of all?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_06.text:
They say he cast the last rays of light upon
an empire standing on the brink of collapse.
He ended up confined in his palace when his
people rebelled, and then the empire crumbled.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_07.text:
And I gather the palace
is that building there?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_08.text:
It is clear the final emperor is 
involved in this incident somehow.
Let us visit his palace.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, Mr. Siugnas! And, um, I'm sorry,
I shouldn't have given up hope so
easily like I did.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_10.text: If you need hope to keep moving forward, then I bid you not to stop. For when your feet cease moving, you may lose nothing, but nor do you gain anything. But the Dismal King intends to meet this final emperor, and for that, I need you.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_000_11.text:
If I can be of some help to you, sir,
then I'll do whatever I have to until
everybody is safe again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_00.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_00.text:
See how determined you are! Does the
final emperor truly interest you so?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_01.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_01.text:
To a man, all who were frozen saw the final
emperor in their dreams. This is more than
a mere curse: the frozen people have come
to regard this regent as a living presence.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_02.text:
And you think the final emperor has returned
from the dead to rule this world anew? Absurd!
What could the man possibly hope to accomplish
in the Grelon of the present?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_03.text:
You must pose such questions to him.
I care only about discerning the nature
of the darkness he commands.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_04.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_04.text:
Then perhaps he's returned from the dead just
to satisfy your personal curiosity, Count!
Because so far as the present residents of
Grelon are concerned, he's merely a nuisance.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_05.text: And what is he to you, General?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_010_CUT_010_06.text: He... He is nothing to me!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_05.text:
The dreams of all here involved
the final emperor in some way.
He is clearly the key to this.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MATCHES_110_CUT_000_06.text:
You're right, Mr. Siugnas! And if we
solve that mystery, we might still
be able to unfreeze everyone! And, um, I'm sorry for giving up.
I shouldn't have done that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, that's Leia! Leia! Hey, Leia!
LEIA, CAN YOU HEAR ME!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, Leia is wonderful! She's a scholar
on a survey team who knows all sorts
of fascinating stories about the past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.text:
Mmm. A scholar may know something
about why this world is frozen.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm going to use a match to save her.
Are you ready?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_999_CUT_000_050.text: The Dismal King stands ever ready.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
You might say that. I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King. What happened here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Sadly, I have no idea—though perhaps we
could learn more from the other people
young Alexandre frees from the ice.
Would you be willing to help with this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Hello, Alexandre. What brings you to Duvall?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The library. We're hoping to do
some research on ancient symbols.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: How scholarly of you! Well, I know you could learn a great deal about them from Nicolas Flamel's Encyclopaedia Alchemica, but I fear it is an extremely dangerous book. Its most important page is protected by mighty guardian beasts charged with keeping its secrets; even Leia from the survey team has decided not to attempt it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
If guardian beasts hold them fast,
they must be valuable secrets indeed.
Permit me to handle them.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
In that case, I'll go prepare our
sturdiest room for you. Good luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Is this the page?
I can sense its power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The text says not to touch it.
So, um... Are you sure you want to?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
A curse of this nature
will have no effect on me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Ah, this is the emblem of thawing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't think we have enough artifacts
to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Then let us search for more.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Boy, this slope sure is steep...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Your legs tremble. Are you well?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Th-they do not! Er, or maybe they do...
But you're a man! You should understand!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Yes, she certainly was a beautiful girl—
but let not lust distract you from our goal!
Fail successfully, and you will impress me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I know—but I'd still rather do it
right once and impress Morgane!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
The ghost emerged to show us this.
How very considerate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I suppose—but I still don't understand
why it would only come out if we failed
at a skiing challenge.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Perhaps there are some it
does not wish to deal with.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I did it! I actually pulled it off!
Morgane is going to think I'm SO cool!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
So her esteem is of more value to
you than that of the Dismal King?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Whoops! That's right. It felt so good
to be skiing that I completely forgot!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
This tunnel may be old,
but you have naught to fear.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: I'm counting on you, Mr. Siugnas!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Fiends. There must be
an artifact nearby.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Help! Fiends! Fiends appeared out
of nowhere and tore my fields apart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wow, that's terrible. Do you think it's
related to the curse of the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Well, Alexandre! You saved me again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Your life was saved by the Dismal King.
Cherish it all the more for that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I can't offer much in thanks, but you can
take anything you like from the windmill.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
What could there be of value
in this dusty shed?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: All I see are bags of flour.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wait, hold on... Isn't this an artifact?
What's it even doing here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: We will show it to that man.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I consider this an offering
to the Dismal King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
That man may know something
about this artifact.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Have you heard about any ancient artifacts
being found in this mine, Esperance?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
This is a mine, not an archaeological site.
Also, the other mines are still frozen,
and I have my hands VERY full dealing
with all of them at the moment. Now perhaps you can go unfreeze those
other mines and stop pestering me with
all of these inane questions?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
I agree Alexandre acted in error when
he rescued you. He should have left you
frozen and thawed all the mines instead.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Huh. Touché, I guess. Mustn't forget
that Alexandre saved my life. My apologies, Alexandre. I've been terribly
busy trying to find out what's going on in
the other mines, and I fear it's left my
temper rather frayed.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
In that case, we'll check them out for you!
If I see anything out of the ordinary,
I'll come let you know right away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
That would be a huge help.
Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text: Do be careful out there, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Do you think there could be
an artifact in this mine?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text: The thought did cross my mind... Let's see what we can find!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Guess I shouldn't have figured
it would come so easy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Why did you agree to help
with the firewood?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Because this could also be
connected to the artifacts!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text: Mmm. In that case, so be it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: I know. Also, this wood was really heavy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text:
Mmm. Though I would not wish to do this
again, I still consider the experience to be
a valuable one.

SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Hang on, I think an artifact just fell out! So Virgile really did see one in the woods!

SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: We will show it to that man.

SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
I consider this an offering
to the Dismal King.

SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
That man may know something
about this artifact.

SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_SIUG_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
There is an ancient inscription here,
but I cannot make any sense of it.
What about you, boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Hmm, let me see... 'When the divine sword
was sealed in ice by the devil's power,
God used the might of spring light to...' Sorry, Mr. Siugnas, but the word for 'melt'
has disappeared from the translation.
I think someone actually erased it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
But not from the original inscription itself.
The symbol that corresponds with the erased 
word remains, and that must be our 'melt.'

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
I don't think we have enough
artifacts to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text: Then let us search for more.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
These must be the bathhouse
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
This resembles the seal.
Can you read it, boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'These baths should all freeze!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
A curse upon the baths?
Humans behave in such strange ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.text: I see nothing else of interest here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the watchtower
ruins we heard about. A tower, mmm? This takes me back.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This resembles the seal.
Can you read it, boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... It's really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'Freeze, you creepy peepers!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
What could they have been peeping on?
How very intriguing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text: I see nothing else of interest here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the church
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This resembles the seal.
Can you read it, boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'Freeze, church!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Words from a believer or a detractor?
Either way, I sympathize with whoever
scrawled such a curse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.text: I see nothing else of interest here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.text: This is one of those artifacts, isn't it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We require more artifacts
to break the seal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We have enough artifacts to break the seal.
Let us return to the palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
We are arrived at the palace
of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Wait, Mr. Siugnas! Thing is, for as long as I can remember, I've heard the palace is cursed and that I should never, ever, ever go in here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
You have nothing to fear from curses
while in the company of the Dismal King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I really admire your confidence, but I don't think
we'll be able to get inside. Those gates won't open,
and even though those walls look climbable,
there are other invisible walls that block you off.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
A magical barrier and a seal set
in these gates? Fascinating.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sense great power here—everyone who lives
near this place can feel it. That's why we've
been worried all this time that the curse of
the final emperor is real.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Even with my power, I cannot lift this;
it appears the final emperor values his
privacy most highly. Can you think of anyone who might
know more of this seal, boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Um, I guess maybe the members
of the survey team?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text: Then let us go and ask them.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
It's no good, sir—we can't get through.
The gates won't open, and there are invisible
walls all around. Um, I mean...unless you
know something I don't?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
A magical barrier and a seal
set in the gate? Fascinating.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_001_CUT_000_.text:
The members of the survey team seem
to know much about the final emperor.
Perhaps they could tell us something.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, Leia? Do you happen to know how to
open the gates to the final emperor's palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You know as well as I that there's no way inside
that palace. If there was, I'd already be in there
giggling with archaeological delight!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Cease your tomfoolery and look into my eyes!
The final emperor. The gates. The seal.
Tell all you know to the Dismal King. Now!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes... As I listened to your words,
it was like the fog cleared from my mind.
What a strange sensation!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
A small taste of my power has thrown
wide the doors of your memory.
Now tell us what you recall.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_050.text:
I don't know anything about how the
seal works; the knowledge and techniques
involved in commanding this sort of power
have long since been lost to us. All we know is that the pieces of the gates'
seal were scattered and likely discarded.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Discarded? Mmm. And yet, the seal
we saw earlier did seem to have
some pieces embedded within it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_070.text:
We believe the adherents of the final emperor
spent a great deal of time assembling the pieces
of that seal. Sadly, this all happened centuries
ago, and the details have been lost to time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
We'd hoped our recent excavation of historical
sites would turn up the rest of the pieces.
Not because we're followers of the final emperor,
mind; it's merely due to scholarly interest.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
You have my gratitude, wise girl,
for your knowledge may well prove
of use to the Dismal King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
But those pieces could be anywhere
in Grelon! We'll never find them all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_LEIA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
Do you forget who you address, boy?
Nothing is beyond the capabilities
of the Dismal King!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_05.text:
The rules of this world do not apply to me.
I wish to lift this seal and meet this
'final emperor' for myself.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_06.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_06.text:
So it's you! YOU'RE the one who's been
filling Alexandre's head with kooky ideas!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GABRIEL_100_CUT_100_14.text:
If there is a key somewhere in this world,
that is enough—and this is a fine chance
to explore and search for it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text: Now let us lift this seal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? Why didn't it work?
What are we missing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is a symbol of the freezing curse;
we saw one just like it at the ruins. All this symbol can do is emit
freezing power. It is in no way
capable of lifting a curse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Um, could we maybe melt it?
If only I still had some matches...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
That would require a symbol of melting.
But if there is a symbol for freezing,
it stands to reason that its opposite
exists as well.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Er, but do you even know what the
melting symbol is, Mr. Siugnas?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
I do not use symbols; this is an art that
dates back to the era of the final emperor.
Is there some place where we might
research various topics of antiquity?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yes! There's a library in Duvall,
and a museum in Varsailles.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text: Now let us open the seal.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You heard everyone's dreams about the final
emperor, right, sir? So what do you think?
What's your sense of him now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
All seemed troubled by their dreams,
and the descriptions of him as cruel
and terrifying may well be true. So let us say I was not disappointed.
If anything, I've grown more intrigued.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
All seemed to enjoy their dreams,
so the descriptions of him as cruel
and terrifying may well be lies. I must admit I have been left rather
disappointed by the whole thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
All had a different experience in their dreams,
which made it difficult to suss out truth.
I hope he does not betray my expectations.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Is that right? Well, I feel like there's
something awful waiting for us.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Is that right? Well, I feel like there's
something wonderful waiting for us.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Is that right? Well, I feel like things
are about to get very complicated.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
If you would turn back, boy,
this is your final chance.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Leia? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I want to go with you to the final emperor's
palace. As a scholar, I have a great desire
to be one of the first to see it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Mr. Siugnas?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
A wise king rewards good service.
You have my sanction.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Gabriel? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
It seems I couldn't put my research behind me
after all; I just can't pass up a chance to
enter the final emperor's palace!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
Well, that's fine with me.
What do you think, Mr. Siugnas?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Long have I sought one who possesses a power such
as yours! Indeed, I am in awe of how effortlessly
you broke the seal that had flummoxed so many for
so long. You have my eternal gratitude.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
And yet, you are still merely Alexandre.
You cannot be the final emperor, and it
is he who I have come so far to see.
So you must reclaim your true power!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Then...you feel the same as I?
Ah, but it is a delight to finally
meet someone who understands! My power is sealed away within this palace.
If I could just reclaim that, the true
emperor would finally be reborn!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you hid yourself among your people as
Alexandre in order to break your seal?
That was quite the complicated scheme. And yet, if all you sought was to lift
the seal, I fail to see why it was
necessary to thaw anyone.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, but I intend to thaw EVERYONE!
They are my subjects, after all.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So you consider your people your
property, then? I must admit I see
the logic in this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I understand you would not have come so far
only to stand in my way now, Siugnas—and
because of this, I would make a final request. I want you to destroy the being who seals
away the final emperor's power. Do that,
and your wish to meet him can be granted.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! Long have we journeyed
together, Alexandre, but never have I found
you more charming than I do now! So be it! Let the name of the man who
brings about your resurrection be
Siugnas, the Dismal King!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
My thanks, Siugnas. Also, does it
please you to have me thank you
in the form of Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Alexandre's gratitude would be naught but
wind to me. However, I have now met the
true final emperor, and so am satisfied.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
In fact, you have not. When next you
visit Grelon, I will greet you in the
true form of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I do look forward to seeing
what becomes of this world.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
So this ends with the final emperor's rebirth.
But for the life of me, I can't understand
WHY the people of Grelon would seek to
live under his rule! Do you not mark him as a talentless hack
whose lone answer for everything was
calling upon the powers of darkness!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
None know this better than you, General.
Why did you rack up so many victories
for such a man? For of all his subjects,
none pursued him so fervently as you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
I cannot deny it: I lived for his praise.
The man entrusted to me an army despite
my appearance, and I won every battle so
I might somehow repay him. Yet in the end, it wasn't me he
turned to, but the power of the dark.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
To the final emperor, I was nothing but
an anonymous retainer. The idea I was an
invincible military general propping up the
emperor was MY impression, not his. In truth, the man likely doesn't
even remember who I was.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
You needn't be so humble, General; I have
no doubt your presence at his side is what
pushed him towards the darkness. Indeed,
Grelon owes its present glory to you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
Regardless, it's a pleasure to work for
someone who values me for a change.
So I beg of you, my Dismal King:
Please accept my eternal loyalty!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text: I will give it to you later.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, General.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_020_.text:
I appreciate the sentiment.
Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text: So it was you after all, boy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
There never was a 'boy.' The Alexandre you knew
was a mere phantom I created to manipulate people
into breaking the seal on my palace—a seal which
has now been very much sundered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
I come here to meet you of my own
free will. Your manipulations were
of no relevance to the Dismal King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
I will now complete my resurrection and arise
to reign forevermore as the eternal emperor.
Do you truly claim this an action of your will?
That your choice alone grants me life?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
All things are born of the darkness,
and all forms of darkness serve
the interests of the Dismal King. For this reason, one might say
all you are born of...is me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Pathetic fool! You misunderstand the extent
of my power, and will pay for your hubris by
becoming a sacrifice in my resurrection rite!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text: Is the final emperor gone for good?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Darkness knows no oblivion. The people of
this world will one day seek the dark again,
and the final emperor will be born anew.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
So foolish people get the foolish
leaders they deserve? Well, at least
my hands are clean this time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
Are you so certain? Was it not the very
ineptitude of your emperor that led you
to serve him all the more fervently?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
One might say that. I sustained his regime
with my unbroken string of victories,
so perhaps this farce of a resurrection
is simply the result of my actions. It was just my damned luck to be
born in a world led by fools.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
But now I serve a far greater darkness,
O Dismal King, and I ask that you accept
my undying loyalty!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Child—or should I say, final emperor.
An impressive performance, feigning
to accept my aid as you did earlier.
I wonder what will happen now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing, dear king. Nothing is what happens.
Why, did you expect me to make some grand 
cackling proclamation about how the empire
will be reborn or the like? No, the legend of the final emperor is long over,
so I'm simply going to take some time and
figure out how to best use this power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course. Well, except for the jerks who pissed
me off—they can stay frozen forever. ...Aaah ha ha! Kidding! Oh my god, your faces!
No, out of respect for all of Alexandre's
hard work, I intend to unfreeze everyone. This is all because of you, Alexandre.
You should be very proud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
If that is your decision,
I will accept it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: *sigh* Do the two of you know what it means to 'overstep your bounds'? If not, please allow me to teach you right now—but know that the fee for the lesson will be your lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
...Alexandre? How strange. I was dreaming
I'd acquired the power of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: It was a dream, Leia. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
I suppose it was: a dream that
will forever go unachieved.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Is it okay to leave things like this?
I mean, Leia doesn't remember anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
The final emperor may attempt to return
once more someday, regardless of the
resolution you chose now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
And when that happens, someone will
have to stand and face him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Or someone can turn and run.
The choice is yours, boy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Well, I don't know if I'm capable of
standing, but I'll sure try my best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text: Mmm. Then I wish you well.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.text:
So that woman was the final emperor?
I'm going to be a liability for our
warrior band if I keep misjudging
people so badly.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.text:
This palace is thick with dark energies.
At times, the forms those energies take
may vary depending on existing conceptions.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.text:
Do you think the final emperor was
corrupted by those same dark energies?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_030_.text: You're saying I was corrupted by the darkness? No, that's what happens next as I serve at your side and get a taste of true power! I hope you accept my loyalty, O King!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
An impressive ruse, final emperor—you
even went so far as to freeze yourself!
I wonder what happens next.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing, dear king. Nothing is what happens.
Why, who could possibly believe that the final
emperor might appear in this day and age? But though the empire is naught but an
anachronism at this point, the power here
can still be wielded in the modern day—
and in very modern ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, that's right. There are still people
trapped in the ice, aren't there? Well, if you wish it, Alexandre, I will restore
them all. Otherwise, they will remain as they
are now. This choice belongs to you alone—
such is the essence of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
If that is your decision,
I will accept it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You two are more clever than I thought.
Only a fool would settle for being ruled
by such a power—the wise person chooses
to rule for themselves!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text: I never imagined it would end like this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
It is but a conclusion
of your own making.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
But is the emperor's power really gone?
Or will it be restored one day?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I don't want to be ruled through force,
so if the final emperor does return,
I'll have no choice but to fight him
with whatever I can muster.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
If that is your decision,
there is nothing for me to add.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_030_.text:
So that man was the final emperor?
I'm going to be a liability for our
warrior band if I keep misjudging
people so badly.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Great power is not achieved without great price.
The form you now take—and your duty to seal
away that monster for all eternity—are all
part of the cost you must pay to be emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: To protect Grelon, I must eliminate the infernal beings who come here from the Conjoined Worlds. This is why I require power—the blame for my actions rests entirely with you and your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
As a king myself, I know well the obligation to
protect a realm from threats beyond its borders.
And so, Lord of Grelon and final emperor, I will
grant you a boon. Merely ask it of me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You can destroy this vile flesh and release
my tormented soul from its sealing duties.
For I am so very weary...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
But if the soul of the final emperor has
been protecting Grelon this whole time,
who's going to do it when you're gone!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You have wisdom enough to know
the answer to that question.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now, you infernal being!
Show me the nobility of your soul!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The soul of the final emperor has
been freed. The rest is up to you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I know that, sir. All of us who live in Grelon 
must take on the responsibility of protecting
it in the final emperor's stead. It won't be
easy, but it has to be done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Walk the road you believe in, boy.
I bid you farewell.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you, Mr. Siugnas.
For everything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text:
So this world's darkness
has been banished?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text:
Darkness knows no oblivion. Though the dark
which once filled the vessel called 'the final
emperor' has been scattered, it will someday
find a new vessel in which to gather.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text: And you think it might be that boy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text:
Mmm. I am uncertain if he is truly
capable of growing into such a being.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text: Ha ha ha ha! You're actually smiling! I thought you were a Dismal King?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_020_.text:
Still, I am impressed with how you granted
Grelon a moment's peace even as you planted
a seed of darkness within that boy. And though I may be unworthy, O King,
will you accept my undying loyalty?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
There is much to be gained from usurping
the Dismal King, but such a thing will
not come easily.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
This is no place for you, boy.
Stand down, then flee as fast
as your legs can carry you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: I'll not let you escape this time!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
See now the Dismal King! If you believe
yourself worthy to become a part of me,
show me that strength!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_010_.text:
Thank you, Mr. Siugnas.
For everything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
I achieved my goal of meeting the final
emperor, and it proved to be quite the
enjoyable time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
A shame I had to be expelled from Grelon,
but I suppose its fate is now in the hands
of its people. So farewell, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Even you seemed surprised by the way
that one played out. How fascinating.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
It is no different from your battle plans, General.
There is always uncertainty when action becomes
execution; a man's talent is determined by how
he controls such elements on the battlefield.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Then perhaps I have talent enough to be
worthy of serving you. O Dismal King,
I ask that you accept my undying loyalty!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
So you are the final emperor.
In that form, I can understand
why your subjects fear you so.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might
use your strength to save this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: No, Leia! That won't save anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: You mustn't judge a book by its cover, Alexandre. Besides, it will be me using this power.... Using it to save the world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
I admire your ambition! Now let us see
if your flesh is as strong as your will.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
If you bare your fangs at me,
I am left with no choice.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't do it, Alexandre... I couldn't
handle the power of the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Your pathetic puppet's strings are cut,
Final Emperor. What will you do now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Impudent fool! Do you think that was
all of the power I possessed!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text: Have a taste of my TRUE might!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Yes, though he may attempt
to return someday.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Well, that's okay. This is our problem now—
so if he does come back, we'll defeat him.
We can't afford to let anyone be tempted
by that power ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
If that is your decision,
I will accept it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Thank you so much for everything, sir.
I hope I can grow up to be as strong
as you are someday.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
I thank you as well, boy, for it is because
of you that I was able to so thoroughly
enjoy my time on this world. Farewell.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text:
That man hasn't changed one bit: He still
wraps himself in the dark while claiming
it to be his own power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text: And you once loved that man?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text:
I...might not use that word. I won battle after
battle to bring him glory, but he always acted
as if he was entitled to my victories. He believed
his dark powers won the day—not his general.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text: And while I learn to accept that, I would have given anything to hear just one word of praise. I wanted recognition. I wanted gratitude. Were these things so much to ask?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text:
Such was the feeling that guided you to
Brighthome, for the battlefield is where
you shine the brightest.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_030_.text:
Which is why I ask this of you now,
my Dismal King: grant me more
battlefields on which to fight!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
So you are the final emperor.
In that form, I can understand
why your subjects fear you so.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might use
your strength to bring order to this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Power is an ugly thing, Alexandre.
Freedom and kindness are beautiful, yes,
but beautiful things cannot maintain order
in this world. Only force can do that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
You believe yourself ready for my power?
Good. Let us see if that is truly the case.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
If you bare your fangs at me,
I am left with no choice.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't handle the power of the
final emperor, Alexandre... But you...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Yes, though he may attempt
to return someday.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
The lust for power is what kept the final
emperor alive for so long. That's something
we all have inside us—and something that
isn't ever going to change.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text: The seductive power of the dark is more powerful than you can imagine, boy. One day, it may be you who becomes the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I can't deny that, but I still
didn't like what I saw of him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Ultimately, the choice will be yours.
But for now, farewell.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Remember well the fiend that haunts this
place, Alexandre. For when this occurs again
someday, I want you to be the one to save
the children of the future.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As for you, demon, the new form you sought
once before stands before you now.
Come and claim it, if you can!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of senile old fools. Begone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Do not fear, child.
Soon, you will be mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
And as for you, my otherworldly visitor,
I will brook no interference from your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As a fellow being of darkness, I'd not 
intended to interfere with you here. But you disappoint me, and so I have changed
my mind. For the Dismal King is a being of
ultimate perfection, and your might is but
a shadow's memory of my own!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Bold words indeed!
