But have you the power to back them up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
As that man said, the final emperor
may someday attempt to return again.
What happens then will be up to you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text: But I can't! I'll never be like Romain!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Just as you could never be me, for you and he
are entirely different people. But for that
same reason, you could become a far more
appealing being, should you wish it. I very much look forward to seeing
if you choose this path.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I wish I had your confidence,
but...okay. I'll try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
With the curse lifted, those who were once
frozen may have been freed. And with that,
it is time for me to leave this world behind.
Farewell to you, boy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Without you, this all would have turned
out very differently. Thank you for
everything you've done for us, sir.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I have heard these words before, Alexandre—on
the day my father sent me fleeing from this palace.
And I have spent every day since thinking about
how to release the emperor from his fate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is time to follow in my father's footsteps.
Expel your exhausted self from that body and
claim mine instead! Then empower its flesh so
I might seize command of this world from you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I don't understand what you're saying,
Romain! I don't understand at all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Now it is your turn, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is just as you said, Romain: you have
successfully crafted the trap and guided
us inside its gaping maw. Well done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
A fair point, as I care nothing
for the fate of this world. However, it is a king's duty to guide and
educate his lessers—and it seems I must
correct a wayward fool who mistakenly
believes he has the better of me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Where did I go wrong? All I ever wanted
was to release the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I am a sinful man. A horror.
There can be no absolution for this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor and Romain are both gone.
Did... Did I do the wrong thing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The fiend that had fused with the final
emperor is gone. The curse upon Grelon
is lifted, and all those who were once
frozen should now be thawed. I will permit you to determine whether
this constitutes victory or failure.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I do feel like some heavy burden has
been lifted from me, so I think that
means I succeeded. I really did it!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
Imagine wanting to be consumed by a
darkness such as that. Humans truly
are creatures beyond redemption.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
And you believe yourself different
from them, General?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
As a military man, I seek victory in all
things—but only through my own power.
Does that make me better? Perhaps not.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
The dark lurks within everyone, everywhere.
Show me that you can tame yours, General!
For I know you possess that ability.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
Did I just receive a writ of permission
from the Dismal King himself? And am
I meant to thank you for that?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.speaker: General_Einherjar
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_020_.text:
What I want is to behold a deeper darkness.
Through that, I believe I will gain the power
to dominate it, just as I dominate in war. So please, my Dismal King!
Accept my undying loyalty!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Aw, the door's locked.
Is there a way to open it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: Something is here. Fall back, boy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Fiends nest within the darkness...
Ah, but this world is a most
pleasant place indeed!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The fiends are here because of the curse!
Grelon's a peaceful place, I swear!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
This shed is still pervaded
with darkness.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
It appears so. Let us attempt
to move that iron box.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
We can use this to get to the ski slope
or down to the bottom of the hill!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
The ice is turning into a fiend?
Ha ha! Wonderful! Come at me, then!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've never seen a real-life fiend before!
People said they roam around in caves and mines,
but I always thought those were just stories
made up to scare children.

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Could be this is connected to the
emperor's curse somehow?

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text: Huh!? The ice is turning into a fiend again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
Get a new trick, ice fiend? Too bad!
You can't surprise me anymore!

SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_SIUG_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Enough with this ice fiend business!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Is there any presence in this
world capable of enticing me?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.text:
If you want precious books,
I've got plenty of those.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_02.text:
There's nothing more enticing
than a good ski run!

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_04.text:
What could be more enticing than
a golden field of wheat!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I've no interest in answering
your questions.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_06.text:
You ever tried eating snow?
It's pretty nasty.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_07.text:
There are many wonderful animals here,
but I doubt that's what you mean.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I met an enticing presence once,
but that was some twenty years back.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_09.text:
I would like to meet an enticing presence
myself one day—although perhaps it's better
that I don't. Might just end up thinking
less of myself in comparison, you know?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_10.text:
An 'enticing presence'?
Who talks like that!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Sandrine
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_11.text:
I know two: myself and Varsailles.
Do you not agree?

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_100_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_100_CUT_000_00.text:
So the final emperor himself
has come to greet me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_100_CUT_000_01.text: Long have I waited for you, my destiny.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_110_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Alas, were I to take you
from this place, your beauty would be lost.
But even should we part, the connection
we share will endure forever.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Sandrine
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_110_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_120_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_120_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_120_CUT_000_01.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_120_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_130_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_130_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Alas, were I to take you
from this place, your beauty would be lost.
But even should we part, the connection
we share will endure forever.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_130_CUT_000_01.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_130_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_140_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_140_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_150_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_150_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_150_CUT_000_01.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_150_CUT_000_01.text: This is a real honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_160_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_160_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_160_CUT_000_01.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_160_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_170_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_170_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_170_CUT_000_01.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_170_CUT_000_01.text: I thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_180_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_180_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_180_CUT_000_01.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_180_CUT_000_01.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_190_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_190_CUT_000_00.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I have enjoyed my time on this world.
Clearly there was value in my coming.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_GUILLAUME_000_CUT_000_.text: Thank you for this honor, O King.

SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W12_EVAR_SIUG_ESPERANCE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I deem you worthy. Even should we part,
your soul will ever be with mine.
